name: BREACH IT
description: "BREACH IT" is tactical multiplayer attack - defend type shooter. As an attacker destroy walls, doors with C4, hammers or tons of bullets to get to the enemy from an angle they would not expect. If you're on defending team, then it's time to get to work! Board doors, reinforce walls and get to position!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4460 3.2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD Fury DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space
